document_data.name: Brister Fendlestick
document_data.mainbody: '''Brister Fendlestick''' was a [[human]] [[wizard]] of the early 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: He traveled the [[Underdark]] in his magical [[iron]] tower (a ''[[Daern's instant fortress]]''), which he carried with him wherever he traveled.
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1338}}, Fendlestick [[polymorph]]ed a [[pech]] into the [[hook horror]] known as "[[Clacker]]." Clacker was then returned to Brister by [[Drizzt Do'Urden]] and [[Belwar Dissengulp]] in order to reverse the spell, but before the transformation could be completed, Clacker lashed out and killed Fendlestick.

The cave where Fendlestick was killed had a fast-moving stream and was known as [[Fendlestick's Folly]].
